Class ProductData

java.lang.Object
plasystem_functions.ProductData
public class ProductData extends Object
Represents a product entity in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the Product table. Stores attributes such as product ID, name, brand, size, type, price, quantity, and restock value, with getters and setters for accessing and modifying these attributes.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    productBrand
    The brand of the product (PROD_BRAND, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private int
    productId
    The unique ID of the product, auto-incremented by the database (PROD_ID).
    private String
    productName
    The name of the product (PROD_NAME, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private double
    productPrice
    The price of the product (PROD_PRICE, REAL NOT NULL, CHECK >= 0).
    private int
    productQuantity
    The quantity of the product in stock (PROD_QUANTITY, INTEGER NOT NULL, CHECK >= 0).
    private int
    productRestockValue
    The restock threshold value for the product (PROD_RESTOCK_VALUE, INTEGER NOT NULL, CHECK >= 0).
    private String
    productSize
    The size of the product (PROD_SIZE, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private String
    productType
    The type of the product (PROD_TYPE, TEXT NOT NULL).

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductData

      public ProductData()
      Default constructor. Initializes a ProductData object with default values (0 for numeric fields, null for String fields).

    • ProductData

      public ProductData(int productId, String productName, String productBrand, String productSize, String productType, double productPrice, int productQuantity, int productRestockValue)
      Constructs a ProductData object with the specified values, initializing all attributes.
      Parameters:
      productId - The unique ID of the product (auto-incremented by the database).
      productName - The name of the product. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      productBrand - The brand of the product. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      productSize - The size of the product. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      productType - The type of the product. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      productPrice - The price of the product. Should be non-negative to match database constraints.
      productQuantity - The quantity of the product in stock. Should be non-negative to match database constraints.
      productRestockValue - The restock threshold value. Should be non-negative to match database constraints.
